name: The Green Must Win
description:
It's the old snakes and ladders game but with different mechanics. In your turns, Manipulate the available numbers for the dice and hit the roll button. Beware, other players will use the same dice for themselves as yours.

This project was made for GMTK 2022 in 48hrs.

Tutorial:

In your turns, you can exclude dice from having some numbers by clicking on the dice faces. But remember! the other 3 players will use the same numbers pool as yours in the next 3 rounds.
